column5: The library in SJT is amazing, so quiet and has all the books I need.
The service at Foodys is too slow during peak hours, but the food is decent.
Wi-Fi in TT is unreliable. It disconnects frequently during my lab sessions.
Attended a great event at Anna Auditorium. The sound system was crystal clear.
The hostel rooms are clean but the mess food needs a lot of improvement.
The security at the main gate is very strict, which is good for safety.
The basketball court is fantastic. Great place to unwind.
The labs in TT have all the latest software installed. Very convenient.
Classrooms are spacious and have good projectors. Faculty is very supportive.
Huge collection of books, but it's hard to find a quiet spot during exams.
I wish the food court had more variety. It's the same menu every week.
Narmada hostel has a great view but faces occasional water shortages.
The central hall is impressive. All major events are held here.
The network connectivity is very poor in this block.
The architecture of MGR Block is modern and very impressive.
The digital library resources are excellent for research purposes.
The food is affordable and tasty, especially the north Indian options.
Hostel rooms are well-designed but need more frequent cleaning.
The campus is a bit far from the main city, but the environment is peaceful.
The labs in AB-1 are state-of-the-art. Really good for practicals.
The library is well-stocked and a great place for quiet study.
The cafeteria has good snacks, but it's often overcrowded.
The hostel has good security, but the Wi-Fi is sometimes unreliable.
The sports facilities are amazing.
The administrative staff are helpful and the process for paperwork is smooth.
